document_data.name: The Wondrous Potions of the Brothers of Ilmater
document_data.mainbody: '''''The Wondrous Potions of the Brothers of Ilmater''''' was an [[Ilmatari]] [[book|tome]] that collected recipes of the Broken God's clergy.
document_data.Contents: The book collected recipes and arcane formulae for various potions, alchemical substances, and items often used by the [[Church of Ilmater]]. The formulas included a version of a ''[[holy water]]'' recipe that used an [[amethyst]] and powdered [[silver]] as its ingredients. A recipe for ''[[tanglefoot bag]]'' called for [[quicksilver]] and [[belladonna]], while a formula for ''[[Thunderstone (item)|thunderstone]]'' required [[diamond]] dust and an amethyst.
document_data.History: As of the {{YearlinkName|1374}}, several copies of ''The Wondrous Potions of the Brothers of Ilmater'' existed in the [[Sword Coast North]] region. One of these books could be found in [[Fort Locke]], and another was stashed in an infamous [[warlock]]'s, [[Ammon Jerro]]'s, hidden Haven.
